content: The Weather-Climate-Emergency Preparedness Scholarly Community was founded by UAlbany's Atmospheric Sciences Research Center (ASRC), the Department of Atmospheric and Environmental Sciences (DAES) â€“ a part of the College of Arts and Sciences (CAS), and the College of Emergency Preparedness, Homeland Security, and Cybersecurity (CEHC).  UAlbany's has one of largest concentrations of scholars and researchers in this interdisciplinary scholarly and research focus area in the nation.
